HotelElement.Name: Melbourne Short Stay Apartments on Whiteman

Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Melbourne Short Stay Apartments on Whiteman in Southbank, you'll be in the business district and minutes from Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex and Polly Woodside. This 4.5-star apartment is close to Melbourne Cricket Ground and St. Kilda Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 120 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and microwaves. Cable programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Conveniences include desks and separate sitting areas, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an indoor pool and a fitness center. This apartment also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), limo/town car service, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The preferred airport for Melbourne Short Stay Apartments on Whiteman is Melbourne, VIC (MEL-Tullamarine) - 19.7 km / 12.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
